compose:
services:
  mi-note-sync:
    volumes:
      - ./data:/app/public/data
    environment:
      - MI_COOKIE= ''
    image: idootop/mi-note-sync:latest
    restart: "no"

  mi-note-web:
    init: true
    ports:
      - 8000:3000
    volumes:
      - ./data:/home/static/data
    image: idootop/mi-note-web:latest
    restart: unless-stopped
